title: Everybody Comes to Rick's
description: A play featuring Rick, an American bar owner of the Cafe Americain in Casablanca, Morocco, who serves a mixed clientel of European exiles and refugees. When a Czech resistance leader and his wife enter the cafe, Rick is confronted with new challenges and choices. Warner Brother's purchased the play, which became a loose basis for the 1942 movie Casablanca.
author: Murray Burnett
